General.Name: Omega Healthcare Investors Inc
General.Description: Omega is a REIT that invests in the long-term healthcare industry, primarily in skilled nursing and assisted living facilities. Its portfolio of assets is operated by a diverse group of healthcare companies, predominantly in a triple-net lease structure. The assets span all regions within the U.S., as well as in the U.K.
General.Address: 303 International Circle, Hunt Valley, MD, United States, 21030
